title: Endings Guide
content:
is ending is the opposite of commanding the brain to destroy the tadpoles and itself, where you will make the second choice. You will succumb to your hunger for power and dominion, and seize the weakness that you see in The Emperor as he battles the temptation presented by The Absolute.

Command the brain to destroy the tadpoles and then itself. "Betray the Emperor. Dominate the brain. Become the Absolute."
